project.name: fbsd
project.author: Otavio Rodolfo Piske
project.description: Running Gentoo on an FreeBSD base system.

longdescription.p: Gentoo/FreeBSD or Gentoo/FBSD is an effort to make a Gentoo experience on top of a FreeBSD base system. We are currently working on many things from base system ebuilds to init scripts. We haven't made a release yet but users are already able to install it using a FreeBSD minimal installation.
This project is still in its infancy. If you are interested in working on it, please send an e-mail to AngusYoung.
